page.title: 03EGGINTON POST OFFICE
page.content: The Post Office is in the centre of the village, and is joined to the school. About three years ago the shop was at the end of Duck Street which is just inside Egginton. It has now been moved to the old school house. The postmistress has two jobs,the first as school caretaker the second is to take care of the shop. The postmistress opens the shop at 9.00am every day apart from Sunday when the shop is closed. At the end of the day she closes the shop at 5.30pm. Her busiest day is Thursday which is pensions day. She sells mostly day to day sorts of things, like sweets, groceries and bread, because most people do their weekly shopping at Burton.
